Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Canyamel Classic in Capdepera (Canyamel), you'll be convenient to Cuevas de Artà and Canyamel Golf. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Torre de Canyamel and Cala Ratjada Port.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Rooms have private balconies. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Canyamel Golf - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Torre de Canyamel - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Cala Ratjada Port - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi

Cala Agulla Beach - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi

San Jaume Church - 34.9 km / 21.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Canyamel Classic is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 61.8 km / 38.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
